title: AnnexRepo.uuid (lazy) property

labels.name: conference agenda item
labels.description: Scheduled to be discussed in a developer meeting

body:
any annexrepo should have a uuid, which also should should not change (other than from None) in its lifespan.  So we could lazily load it e.g. from config

``` python
if not self._uuid:
   repocfg = vcs.repo.config_reader() 
   self._uuid = repocfg.get_value('annex', 'uuid')
```

but in case of fresh git clones of annex repos we might need to run e.g. `git annex info --fast` first so annex generates a UUID for this particular instance

``` shell
hopa:/tmp
$> git clone d1 d2
Cloning into 'd2'...
done.

$> cd d2
(venv-tests) 2 12410 [2].....................................:Thu 11 Aug 2016 10:25:45 AM EDT:.
(git)hopa:/tmp/d2[master]
$> cat .git/config 
[core]
    repositoryformatversion = 0
    filemode = true
    bare = false
    logallrefupdates = true
[remote "origin"]
    url = /tmp/d1
    fetch = +refs/heads/*:refs/remotes/origin/*
[branch "master"]
    remote = origin
    merge = refs/heads/master
(venv-tests) 2 12411 [2].....................................:Thu 11 Aug 2016 10:25:47 AM EDT:.
(git)hopa:/tmp/d2[master]
$> git annex info --fast --json
(merging origin/git-annex into git-annex...)
(recording state in git...)
{"command":"info","key":null,"file":null,"repository mode":"indirect","trusted repositories":[],"semitrusted repositories":[{"here":false,"uuid":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001","description":"web"},{"here":false,"uuid":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000002","description":"bittorrent"},{"here":false,"uuid":"25a7c4e5-4bf5-4d2f-9c42-322438bda875","description":"yoh@hopa:/tmp/d1 [origin]"},{"here":true,"uuid":"2f09ab75-e369-42e4-b852-47946933d260","description":"yoh@hopa:/tmp/d2"}],"untrusted repositories":[],"transfers in progress":[],"available local disk space":"773.75 megabytes (+1 megabyte reserved)","success":true}
(venv-tests) 2 12412 [2].....................................:Thu 11 Aug 2016 10:25:51 AM EDT:.
(git)hopa:/tmp/d2[master]
$> cat .git/config             
[core]
    repositoryformatversion = 0
    filemode = true
    bare = false
    logallrefupdates = true
[remote "origin"]
    url = /tmp/d1
    fetch = +refs/heads/*:refs/remotes/origin/*
    annex-uuid = 25a7c4e5-4bf5-4d2f-9c42-322438bda875

    remote = origin
    merge = refs/heads/master
[annex]
    uuid = 2f09ab75-e369-42e4-b852-47946933d260
    version = 5
```
